Meet Me in Phandalin.description: Gundren Rockseeker hires the party to escort a wagonload of provisions from Neverwinter to Barthen's Provisions in Phandalin. Gundren has gone ahead with his warrior escort Sildar Hallwinter, claiming he and his brothers found 'something big.' The wagon contains mining supplies and food worth 100 gp total.
objectives: Escort the wagon of supplies from Neverwinter to Phandalin
Deliver the wagon safely to Barthen's Provisions
Meet Me in Phandalin.rewards: 10 gp per character from Elmar Barthen upon delivery
Meet Me in Phandalin.location: Neverwinter to Phandalin via Triboar Trail

Goblin Ambush.description: While traveling the Triboar Trail, the party encounters two dead horses (belonging to Gundren and Sildar) and is ambushed by four goblins of the Cragmaw tribe. The goblins have been using this spot for ambushes. A trail leads to the Cragmaw Hideout where Sildar is held captive.
objectives: Survive the goblin ambush
Discover the goblin trail leading to the Cragmaw Hideout
Identify the dead horses as belonging to Gundren and Sildar
Goblin Ambush.rewards: 75 XP per character for arriving at the hideout
Goblin Ambush.location: Triboar Trail, half-day's march from Phandalin

Rescue Sildar Hallwinter.description: Sildar Hallwinter, a member of the Lords' Alliance, is held prisoner in the Cragmaw Hideout (area 6, the Goblin Den). He has been beaten and is at 1 HP. The goblin leader Yeemik holds him hostage and may try to bargain. Sildar knows Gundren and his map were sent to Cragmaw Castle.
objectives: Rescue Sildar from the Cragmaw Hideout
Escort Sildar safely to Phandalin
Learn about Gundren's capture and the Black Spider
Rescue Sildar Hallwinter.rewards: 50 gp from Sildar for escort to Phandalin; 275 XP per character for completing the Cragmaw Hideout

Clear the Cragmaw Hideout.description: The Cragmaw tribe hideout is led by a bugbear named Klarg, who has orders from King Grol to plunder caravans and waylay Gundren Rockseeker. The hideout contains stolen Lionshield Coster goods, Klarg's treasure, and information about the Black Spider's involvement.
objectives: Defeat Klarg the bugbear and his forces
Recover stolen Lionshield Coster supplies
Learn about King Grol and Cragmaw Castle
Clear the Cragmaw Hideout.rewards: 275 XP per character; treasure including 600 cp, 110 sp, two potions of healing, jade frog statuette (40 gp)
Clear the Cragmaw Hideout.location: Cragmaw Hideout, 5 miles northwest of the ambush site

Return Stolen Lionshield Goods.description: Crates and supplies in Klarg's cave (area 8 of Cragmaw Hideout) are marked with the blue lion symbol of the Lionshield Coster. Linene Graywind at the Lionshield Coster trading post in Phandalin is the rightful owner and will reward the party for returning them.
objectives: Recover the stolen supplies from the Cragmaw Hideout
Return them to Linene Graywind at the Lionshield Coster in Phandalin
Return Stolen Lionshield Goods.rewards: 50 gp and Linene's friendship and future assistance

Confront the Redbrands.description: The Redbrands are a gang of ruffians terrorizing Phandalin, led by a mysterious figure called Glasstaff. They hang out at the Sleeping Giant tap house and have a base under Tresendar Manor. Multiple NPCs in Phandalin urge the characters to deal with them. The Redbrands murdered woodcarver Thel Dendrar and kidnapped his family.
Confront the Redbrands.quest_giver: Multiple Phandalin NPCs (Toblen Stonehill, Daran Edermath, Barthen, townsfolk)
objectives: Confront the Redbrand ruffians
Investigate Tresendar Manor
Storm the Redbrand Hideout
Defeat or capture Glasstaff (Iarno Albrek)
Confront the Redbrands.rewards: 400 XP for defeating ruffians at Sleeping Giant; additional XP throughout the hideout
Confront the Redbrands.location: Phandalin - Sleeping Giant tap house / Tresendar Manor

Finding Iarno Albrek.description: Sildar Hallwinter's fellow Lords' Alliance member, Iarno Albrek, disappeared two months ago after arriving in Phandalin to establish order. Sildar asks the party to investigate Tresendar Manor to find Iarno. Unknown to Sildar, Iarno IS Glasstaff, leader of the Redbrands, who betrayed the Alliance to work for the Black Spider.
objectives: Investigate Tresendar Manor and surrounding area
Find Iarno Albrek (discover he is Glasstaff)
Capture Iarno and return him to face justice, or eliminate the Redbrand threat
Finding Iarno Albrek.rewards: 200 gp from Sildar for eliminating the Redbrand threat
Finding Iarno Albrek.location: Redbrand Hideout beneath Tresendar Manor, Phandalin

Halia's Job Offer.description: Halia Thornton, guildmaster of the Phandalin Miner's Exchange and secret Zhentarim agent, offers to pay the characters to eliminate the Redbrand leader Glasstaff and bring her any correspondence found in his quarters. She secretly wants to take over the Redbrand operation herself. A DC 15 Wisdom (Insight) check reveals her ulterior motives.
objectives: Eliminate the Redbrand leader (Glasstaff)
Bring Halia any correspondence found in Glasstaff's quarters
Halia's Job Offer.rewards: 100 gp from Halia; possible Zhentarim membership (title of Fang)

Rescue the Dendrar Family.description: The Redbrands murdered woodcarver Thel Dendrar and kidnapped his wife Mirna and their two teenage children (Nars, 13, and Nilsa, 18). They are held in the slave pens (area 5) of the Redbrand Hideout beneath Tresendar Manor, intended to be sold into slavery. Thel's body is in the crevasse in area 8.
Rescue the Dendrar Family.quest_giver: Trilena (innkeeper's wife at Stonehill Inn, provides rumor)
objectives: Find and rescue Mirna Dendrar and her children from the Redbrand slave pens
Return the family safely to Phandalin
Rescue the Dendrar Family.rewards: 200 XP for defeating guards + 100 XP if Dendrars make it back alive; leads to Mirna's Heirloom side quest

Mirna's Heirloom.description: Mirna Dendrar, if rescued from the Redbrand slave pens, tells the party about a family heirloom left behind when her family fled Thundertree years ago. An emerald necklace is hidden in a case beneath storage shelves in her family's old herb and alchemy shop in the southeast part of Thundertree.
objectives: Travel to the ruins of Thundertree
Find the old herb and alchemy shop in the southeast part of town
Search beneath the storage shelves for the hidden case (DC 15 Perception, auto-success if Mirna sent them)
Mirna's Heirloom.rewards: Gold necklace with emerald pendant (200 gp); 200 XP bonus if returned to Mirna instead of kept
Mirna's Heirloom.location: Ruins of Thundertree, southeast section (Area 9 - Herbalist's Shop)

The Banshee's Bargain.description: Sister Garaele of the Shrine of Luck (a Harper agent) was tasked by her superiors to persuade the banshee Agatha to reveal the location of Bowgentle's spellbook. Garaele failed and asks the party to bring Agatha a jeweled silver comb as a gift and ask about the spellbook. Agatha can answer one question -- she traded the spellbook to a necromancer named Tsernoth from Iriaebor over a hundred years ago.
objectives: Travel to Conyberry and find Agatha's lair in Neverwinter Wood
Present the jeweled silver comb to Agatha
Flatter Agatha and persuade her (DC 15 Persuasion, auto-success with comb) to answer a question
Ask about Bowgentle's spellbook (or choose another question)
The Banshee's Bargain.rewards: Three potions of healing from Sister Garaele; 200 XP per character; possible Harper membership (title of Watcher)
The Banshee's Bargain.location: Conyberry / Agatha's Lair in Neverwinter Wood

Old Owl Trouble.description: Daran Edermath (retired adventurer, Order of the Gauntlet member) has heard that someone is digging around the ruins of Old Owl Well, an ancient Netherese watchtower, and that undead have been seen guarding the area. He asks the party to investigate. The ruins are occupied by Hamun Kost, a Red Wizard of Thay (necromancer), who has twelve zombies as guards and is researching the site's arcane history.
objectives: Travel to Old Owl Well (a couple days' march northeast of Phandalin)
Discover who is camped there and what they are doing
Report findings back to Daran Edermath
Old Owl Trouble.rewards: 200 XP for parlaying with Hamun Kost and reporting back; 800 XP if Kost and zombies are defeated; possible Order of the Gauntlet membership (title of Chevall)
Old Owl Trouble.location: Old Owl Well, hills northeast of Phandalin

Hamun Kost's Bargain.description: Hamun Kost, the Red Wizard at Old Owl Well, is willing to trade information if the party does favors for him. He wants the orcs at Wyvern Tor removed (they've scouted his camp), and he wants to know the name of the wizard who built Old Owl Well's tower (the answer is Arthindol, which Agatha the banshee knows).
objectives: Remove the orcs from Wyvern Tor (overlaps with Orc Trouble quest)
Ask Agatha the banshee the name of the wizard who built Old Owl Well (answer: Arthindol)
Hamun Kost's Bargain.rewards: Information about Cragmaw Castle, Wave Echo Cave, or other adventure elements from Kost
Hamun Kost's Bargain.location: Old Owl Well / Wyvern Tor / Agatha's Lair

Orc Trouble.description: Townmaster Harbin Wester has posted a notice seeking adventurers to deal with orc raiders near Wyvern Tor on the east end of the Triboar Trail. The orcs are scouts of the Many Arrows tribe led by Brughor Axe-Biter, with six ordinary orcs and an ogre named Gog. They have been raiding homesteads and waylaying travelers.
objectives: Travel east on the Triboar Trail to Wyvern Tor
Find the hidden orc camp (DC 15 Perception or DC 10 Survival per hour)
Defeat or drive off the orc band including Brughor Axe-Biter and the ogre Gog
Orc Trouble.rewards: 100 gp from Harbin Wester; 1,250 XP total for defeating the orcs and ogre; also fulfills Hamun Kost's request
Orc Trouble.location: Wyvern Tor, hills northeast of the Sword Mountains

Reidoth the Druid.description: Qelline Alderleaf suggests the party seek out her friend Reidoth, a druid of the Emerald Enclave, who recently set out for the ruins of Thundertree. Reidoth knows the locations of Cragmaw Castle and Wave Echo Cave. He will provide directions to Cragmaw Castle freely, but will only guide the party to Wave Echo Cave if they first chase off the green dragon Venomfang from Thundertree.
objectives: Travel to the ruins of Thundertree (~50 miles northwest of Phandalin)
Find Reidoth the druid (Area 4)
Learn the location of Cragmaw Castle and/or Wave Echo Cave
Reidoth the Druid.rewards: Directions to Cragmaw Castle (free); guide to Wave Echo Cave (if Venomfang is driven off); possible Emerald Enclave membership (title of Springwarden)

Drive Off Venomfang.description: A young green dragon named Venomfang has claimed the ruined tower in Thundertree as its lair, killing the giant spiders that previously dwelled there. Reidoth wants the dragon driven off. Venomfang will flee if reduced to half HP. A group of cultists led by Favric has also come to Thundertree to treat with the dragon.
objectives: Confront Venomfang in the tower (Area 7)
Drive the dragon away (reduce to half HP) or defeat it
Optionally deal with the cultists (Area 13) who serve the dragon
Drive Off Venomfang.rewards: 2,000 XP for driving away Venomfang (3,900 XP if slain); treasure in tower: 800 sp, 150 gp, four silver goblets with moonstones (60 gp each), scroll of misty step, scroll of lightning bolt, +1 battleaxe Hew; Reidoth guides party to Wave Echo Cave

Finding Cragmaw Castle.description: Sildar Hallwinter offers a substantial reward for locating Cragmaw Castle, the stronghold of King Grol and the Cragmaw goblin tribe. Gundren Rockseeker and his map to Wave Echo Cave were taken there. Multiple paths lead to the castle: captured goblins can provide directions, Reidoth knows the way, Agatha can reveal the location, or wilderness patrols can be followed.
objectives: Locate Cragmaw Castle (about 20 miles northeast of the Cragmaw Hideout, in Neverwinter Wood)
Defeat or drive off King Grol and the Cragmaw tribe
Rescue Gundren Rockseeker
Recover Gundren's map to Wave Echo Cave
Finding Cragmaw Castle.rewards: 500 gp from Sildar for locating and defeating the tribe's chieftain; possible Lords' Alliance membership (title of Cloak)

Rescue Gundren Rockseeker.description: Gundren Rockseeker is held unconscious (0 HP, stable) in King Grol's quarters at Cragmaw Castle (Area 14). King Grol (a bugbear with 45 HP) is negotiating with Vyerith, a doppelganger disguised as a female drow, who is a messenger from the Black Spider sent to collect Gundren and the map. Grol wants to sell the map instead. Gundren's map to Wave Echo Cave is hidden under Grol's bed mattress.
objectives: Infiltrate or storm Cragmaw Castle
Defeat King Grol and the doppelganger Vyerith
Revive and rescue Gundren Rockseeker
Recover Gundren's map to Wave Echo Cave
Rescue Gundren Rockseeker.rewards: 950 XP for defeating King Grol, wolf, and doppelganger; 200 XP for rescuing Gundren and escorting him to Phandalin; 25 gp each from Gundren; promise of 10% share of mine profits; map to Wave Echo Cave

Wave Echo Cave - The Lost Mine.description: The main quest of the adventure. Wave Echo Cave contains the lost mine of the Phandelver's Pact, including the legendary Forge of Spells. Nezznar the Black Spider (a drow) and his followers are exploring the cave, searching for the Forge. The mine is overrun with undead, strange monsters, and Nezznar's bugbear servants. The party must navigate the dangers, defeat Nezznar, rescue Nundro Rockseeker, and secure the mine.
objectives: Travel to Wave Echo Cave (15 miles east of Phandalin, in the Sword Mountains)
Explore the mine and discover the Forge of Spells
Defeat Nezznar the Black Spider (drow mage in Area 19)
Rescue Nundro Rockseeker (prisoner in Area 20)
Clear the mine of undead and monsters
Secure the Forge of Spells and the mine's treasures
Wave Echo Cave - The Lost Mine.rewards: XP from numerous encounters throughout the cave; major treasure including Lightbringer (+1 mace), Dragonguard (+1 breastplate), gauntlets of ogre power, boots of striding and springing, spider staff, multiple potions and scrolls, thousands of coins and gems; 10% share of mine profits; double XP if Nezznar captured alive; 200 XP for rescuing Nundro
Wave Echo Cave - The Lost Mine.location: Wave Echo Cave, Sword Mountains (15 miles east of Phandalin)

Defeat the Black Spider.description: Nezznar, a drow adventurer known as the Black Spider, is the main villain of the adventure. He controls a network of bandit gangs (Redbrands) and goblin tribes (Cragmaws) and orchestrated the capture of Gundren Rockseeker. He is searching Wave Echo Cave for the Forge of Spells to craft powerful magic items. He is found in Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin) with two giant spiders and up to four bugbears.
objectives: Reach Nezznar's position in Wave Echo Cave (Area 19)
Defeat or capture Nezznar and his minions (2 giant spiders, up to 4 bugbears)
Prevent the Black Spider from controlling the Forge of Spells
Defeat the Black Spider.rewards: Nezznar's XP value (double if captured alive); spider staff, potion of healing, iron key to Area 20; Nezznar's treasure sack (190 ep, 130 gp, 15 pp, nine gemstones worth 10 gp each, electrum ale mug worth 100 gp)
Defeat the Black Spider.location: Wave Echo Cave, Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin)

Rescue Nundro Rockseeker.description: Nundro Rockseeker, the youngest of the three Rockseeker brothers, is held prisoner by Nezznar in Area 20 (Priests' Quarters) of Wave Echo Cave. The door is locked (DC 15 Dexterity with thieves' tools). Nezznar has been interrogating Nundro harshly, trying to learn more about the mine. Tharden, the other brother, was killed and his body lies at the cave entrance (Area 1).
objectives: Find Nundro in the locked Priests' Quarters (Area 20)
Obtain the key from Nezznar or pick the lock
Free Nundro and ensure his safety
Rescue Nundro Rockseeker.rewards: 200 XP if Nundro is rescued and survives the adventure

Find the Forge of Spells.description: The Forge of Spells (Area 15) is the legendary workshop where human wizards, allied with the dwarves and gnomes of the Phandelver's Pact, used powerful magic to enchant weapons and armor. The forge's power has waned but its brazier of green flame can still temporarily enchant weapons and armor (+1 for 1d12 hours). A deranged spectator guards the forge and its remaining treasures: Lightbringer and Dragonguard.
objectives: Navigate through Wave Echo Cave to find the Forge of Spells
Deal with the spectator guardian (defeat, trick with DC 15 Deception, or blind it)
Recover Lightbringer (+1 mace) and Dragonguard (+1 breastplate)
Optionally use the brazier to temporarily enchant equipment
Find the Forge of Spells.rewards: Lightbringer (+1 mace, extra 1d6 radiant vs undead, glows like torch on command); Dragonguard (+1 breastplate, advantage on saves vs dragon breath); temporary +1 enchantment from brazier
Find the Forge of Spells.location: Wave Echo Cave, Area 15 (Forge of Spells)

Mormesk the Wraith's Bargain.description: The wraith Mormesk haunts the Wizards' Quarters (Area 14) of Wave Echo Cave, guarding treasure he amassed in life. He leads the undead of the cave. Mormesk can be negotiated with if offered something valuable (magic items, scrolls, spellbooks) -- he will trade access to his treasure and books in exchange for the party killing the spectator in Area 15. His books contain a map to a dungeon that can serve as a future adventure hook.
objectives: Negotiate with Mormesk by offering a magic gift (DC 10 Persuasion to convince him of its value)
Kill the spectator in the Forge of Spells (Area 15) per Mormesk's request
Search his books for the hidden map (DC 12 Investigation)
Mormesk the Wraith's Bargain.rewards: Access to Mormesk's treasure (1,100 cp, 160 sp, 50 ep, three diamonds worth 100 gp each); map to future adventure dungeon in a preserved tome

Carp's Secret Tunnel.description: Carp Alderleaf, the spirited 10-year-old son of Qelline Alderleaf, discovered a secret tunnel near Tresendar Manor while playing in the woods. He saw 'big ugly bandits' emerge from it and meet with Redbrands. The tunnel leads directly to Area 8 of the Redbrand Hideout, providing an alternative entrance that bypasses the main stronghold.
Carp's Secret Tunnel.quest_giver: Carp Alderleaf (via Pip at Stonehill Inn, or directly from Qelline)
objectives: Speak with Carp Alderleaf about the secret tunnel
Use the tunnel to infiltrate the Redbrand Hideout (leads to Area 8)
Carp's Secret Tunnel.rewards: Tactical advantage -- secret entrance to the Redbrand Hideout

Deal with the Thundertree Cultists.description: A group of cultists led by Favric have come to the ruins of Thundertree (Area 13) to treat with the green dragon Venomfang. Favric has a coffer of tribute (three diamonds worth 100 gp each) and a potion of flying. If the characters express interest in the dragon, Favric proposes an alliance but secretly plans to offer them to the dragon as tribute.
objectives: Discover the cultists in Thundertree
Defeat or drive away the cultists
Optionally prevent them from allying with Venomfang
Deal with the Thundertree Cultists.rewards: 150 XP; three diamonds (100 gp each); potion of flying from Favric

Faction Recruitment - Harpers.description: If the party helps Sister Garaele complete the Banshee's Bargain quest and learns the fate of Bowgentle's spellbook, Garaele privately approaches party members who exemplify the Harpers' values (equality, opposing abuse of power, aiding the oppressed) and urges them to join the Harpers.
objectives: Complete the Banshee's Bargain quest
Accept Sister Garaele's invitation to join the Harpers
Faction Recruitment - Harpers.rewards: Title of Watcher in the Harpers

Faction Recruitment - Order of the Gaunt.description: If the party deals with the Redbrands and investigates Old Owl Well, Daran Edermath privately approaches party members who exemplify the Order's virtues (honor, vigilance) and urges them to join the Order of the Gauntlet.
objectives: Deal with the Redbrands in Phandalin
Investigate Old Owl Well
Accept Daran's invitation to join the Order of the Gauntlet
Faction Recruitment - Order of the Gaunt.rewards: Title of Chevall in the Order of the Gauntlet

Faction Recruitment - Lords' Alliance.description: If the party eliminates the goblin threat from Cragmaw Castle or uncovers Iarno's treachery, Sildar Hallwinter privately approaches party members who desire security of civilization through action and urges them to join the Lords' Alliance.
objectives: Eliminate the Cragmaw Castle goblin threat OR uncover Iarno's treachery
Accept Sildar's invitation to join the Lords' Alliance
Faction Recruitment - Lords' Alliance.rewards: Title of Cloak in the Lords' Alliance

Faction Recruitment - Zhentarim.description: If the party disposes of the Redbrand leader (Glasstaff), Halia Thornton approaches party members who share the Zhentarim's pursuits (wealth and power) and urges them to join the Zhentarim. Even if the party wipes out the entire Redbrand gang, Halia might extend the offer to gain friends and spies within the party.
objectives: Eliminate Glasstaff (Iarno Albrek)
Accept Halia's invitation to join the Zhentarim
Faction Recruitment - Zhentarim.rewards: Title of Fang in the Zhentarim

Faction Recruitment - Emerald Enclave.description: If the party helps Reidoth by driving off Venomfang from Thundertree, the druid privately approaches party members who exemplify protecting the natural order and urges them to join the Emerald Enclave.
objectives: Drive off Venomfang from Thundertree
Accept Reidoth's invitation to join the Emerald Enclave
Faction Recruitment - Emerald Enclave.rewards: Title of Springwarden in the Emerald Enclave

The Black Spider's Letter.description: In Glasstaff's quarters (Area 12 of the Redbrand Hideout), the characters find a letter from the Black Spider ordering Iarno to capture or kill strangers arriving in Phandalin who might be working for the dwarves, and to deliver any dwarven maps. This reveals the Black Spider's identity as an organized villain and connects the Redbrands to the larger plot.
objectives: Find the Black Spider's letter in Glasstaff's quarters
Learn about the conspiracy connecting the Redbrands, Cragmaw goblins, and the Black Spider
The Black Spider's Letter.rewards: Key plot information connecting the adventure threads; evidence of Iarno's betrayal

Bowgentle's Spellbook.description: The Harpers want to know the location of a spellbook belonging to the legendary mage Bowgentle. Agatha the banshee knows the answer: she traded it to a necromancer named Tsernoth from the city of Iriaebor more than a hundred years ago. This information allows the Harpers to continue their search.
objectives: Ask Agatha about the spellbook's location
Learn that it was traded to Tsernoth of Iriaebor
Report back to Sister Garaele
Bowgentle's Spellbook.rewards: Three potions of healing; 200 XP; Harper membership opportunity

Claim Wave Echo Cave.description: The ultimate conclusion of the adventure. With the Black Spider defeated, the mine cleared of monsters, and the Rockseeker brothers rescued, the adventurers help establish the mine under Gundren and Nundro's administration. The restored mines will bring great riches to Phandalin and help establish peace and prosperity in the area.
objectives: Defeat the Black Spider in Wave Echo Cave
Clear the mine of remaining threats
Rescue both surviving Rockseeker brothers
Secure the Forge of Spells
Claim Wave Echo Cave.rewards: 10% share of the mine's profits; permanent warm welcome in Phandalin; characters reach 5th level; option to restore Tresendar Manor or establish homes

The Hobgoblin Bounty.description: The Black Spider has placed a bounty on the adventurers. Hobgoblin patrols in the Triboar Trail area carry a crude sketch of one party member with '25 gold pieces for this one' and a black spider symbol. This is encountered as a wilderness random encounter.
objectives: Survive or defeat hobgoblin bounty hunters
Learn about the Black Spider's bounty on the party
The Hobgoblin Bounty.rewards: XP from defeating hobgoblins; knowledge that the Black Spider is actively hunting the party

Agatha's Question.description: The banshee Agatha is a powerful diviner who will answer exactly one question if properly approached with respect and flattery (and ideally Sister Garaele's silver comb). While the default question is about Bowgentle's spellbook, the characters can ask about anything: the location of Cragmaw Castle, Wave Echo Cave, the identity of the Black Spider, or Hamun Kost's question about Old Owl Well's builder.
objectives: Present a gift and be respectful to Agatha
Ask one question (DC 15 Persuasion, auto-success with comb)
Choose wisely - only one question allowed
Agatha's Question.rewards: Answer to one question about any adventure topic; 200 XP
Agatha's Question.location: Agatha's Lair, Neverwinter Wood near Conyberry
